theWildCard:BlankContract.NAME: Blank Contract
theWildCard:BlankContract.FLAVOR: An endless sea of possibilities awaits . . .
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #b3 times you draw a Persona each combat, draw a card.

theWildCard:VelvetContract.NAME: Velvet Contract
theWildCard:VelvetContract.FLAVOR: The contract is sealed, and with it, your fate.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a Persona, draw a card.

theWildCard:Evoker.NAME: Evoker
theWildCard:Evoker.FLAVOR: A remnant of another story. It is cherished by those he left behind
DESCRIPTIONS: Persona, add a random Persona to your hand.

theWildCard:Wildcard.NAME: Wildcard
theWildCard:Wildcard.FLAVOR: Just looking at it is enough to make you feel dizzy.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, put a card from your draw pile into your hand.

theWildCard:FigureOfDeath.NAME: Figure of Death
theWildCard:FigureOfDeath.FLAVOR: The Arcana is the means by which all is revealed.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. At the end of your turn, exhaust ALL Persona in your hand.
